title: Fs--t206's just added uzit(sgc 10) pied 42, sov. 460's hindu to 175 card list
author: forazzurri2axz

posts.post_title: Fs--t206's just added uzit(sgc 10) pied 42, sov. 460's hindu to 175 card list
posts.post_content:
First of all, thanks to a number of fellow Net 54 T206 collectors I have sold a number of the 175 cards listed here a few days ago........I have just added a number of tough backs to the list, including a Leach UZIT, Hindu psa 5, several Sovereign 460's, a Pied 42, EPDG'S and a Tolstoi or two.

Once again, payment by ck or MO....scans available upon request......
Shipping just $3 first card, $1 for each after that and I pay insurance

If you would like the spreadsheet emailed to you, please  email me at [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url] or cell is 770 873 1181

thanks in advance
Bill Latzko
hi bill- email sent on the hindu

bill!!

just sent email....interested in the piedy 42:) just need price and scan





also, need scans of sov 460 and uzit


thanks

johnny

Hi Bill,

I would only be interested in a Luther Taylor with a Tolstoi or some other very rare back.  Do you have one hiding out somewhere that hasn't made your list yet?  

Thanks,
Scott.

Nice pick ups from Bill - Hunky Shay and Larry Schlafly

Dave
